name: Tobicam
0:
”Alexa, show my front door”
”Alexa, show kitchen cam”
”Alexa, show me kids room”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Tobicam skill for Amazon Alexa.

Before you enable this skill, you must make sure your Tobicam smart home camera is online and updated to the latest firmware. To enable the skill say – “Alexa, enable Tobicam skill” then follow the simple instructions on your Alexa app to link your Tobicam account to your Alexa account.

You can also enable and setup this Skill by using the Alexa app by searching for Tobicam skill. Select the 'Enable Skill' button to link your Tobicam account to your Alexa account. 

When the setup has completed, you can stream live video footage on your Echo Show. 
Some of the example commands are:

"Alexa, show Kids cam." 
"Alexa, show my front door."
"Alexa, stop."

Alexa also works with shared users, so friends and family whom you allow access to Tobicam can use their own Echo Show to connect to your Tobicam. 

Compatible Amazon Alexa Devices:
- Echo Show
- Echo Spot
-FireTV Stick Gen 2
-FireTV Gen 2
-FireTV 4K Gen 3
-FireTV Cube
-Fire Tablet 7 or higher
